title: MCR-678-001: Validate Reason Code - Stolen (Vehicle with no active alerts)
custom_preconds: Valid vehicle registration number with no alerts

custom_steps_separated.content:
Go to front office menu

Enter a valid vehicle registration number with no alerts
custom_steps_separated.expected: Redirected to the vehicle details screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
Click on the ‘Motor Tax’ tab

Select the current valid tax disc with more than three months remaining
custom_steps_separated.expected: See the full details of the motor tax disc

custom_steps_separated.content:
Set the “Refund Due?” radio button

Select the “Vehicle Stolen” Cancel Reason code

Provide the Cancellation Start Date
custom_steps_separated.expected: Confirm that the refund amount is calculated pro rata, based on the number of months remaining on the tax disc

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on “Continue” to confirm the cancel motor tax transaction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Error message “Cannot select this reason code - no active stolen alert exists for the vehicle” is displayed at the top of the screen 

Cancel Reason field is highlighted in red
